# Required Files

```yaml
required_files:
  - ops/env/README.md
  - ops/env/OWNER.md
  - ops/env/REQUIRED_FILES.md
  - ops/env/base/overlay.json
  - ops/env/dev/overlay.json
  - ops/env/ci/overlay.json
  - ops/env/prod/overlay.json
  - ops/schema/env/overlay.schema.json
required_dirs: []
forbidden_patterns:
  - ops/obs/
  - ops/schema/obs/
notes:
  - authored_root: ops/env/base/overlay.json
  - authored_root: ops/env/prod/overlay.json
```
